description: Try this simple pork leg roast recipe made with just three ingredients. The result is succulent, tender meat with the added bonus of pork crackling.
name: Pork Leg Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rub with oil and season with salt, then arrange on a wire rack over a roasting pan. Bake for 20 minutes, then reduce heat to 180°C and bake for 40 minutes. Increase heat to 220°C again and bake for a further 15 minutes. You'll know it's done when the crackling has formed and a probe thermometer reads 74°C in the thickest part. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve and serve with apple sauce.
